text: 2000–01 Polish Volleyball League was the 65th season of Polish Championship (1st season as professional league) organized by Professional Volleyball League SA () under the supervision of Polish Volleyball Federation (). Stolarka Wołomin was promoted to Polish Volleyball League in this season. In season 2000/2001 Mostostal-Azoty Kędzierzyn-Koźle played in CEV Champions League, GTPS Gorzów Wielkopolski in CEV Top Teams Cup and Galaxia AZS Częstochowa played in the CEV Challenge Cup. Mostostal-Azoty Kędzierzyn-Koźle achieved 3rd title of Polish Champion. ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left;" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 2001–02 CEV Champions League |- |width=10px bgcolor=#bbebff| ||Qualified for the 2001–02 CEV Top Teams Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor=#e6f8ff| ||Qualified for the 2001–02 CEV Challenge Cup |- |width=10px bgcolor=#FFE7E7| ||Play-offs with the 2nd team of 1st league |- |width=10px bgcolor=#FFCCCC| ||Relegation to the 1st league |- |} {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=290|Team |- bgcolor=#ccffcc | |align=left|Mostostal- Azoty Kędzierzyn-Koźle |- bgcolor=#e6f8ff | |align=left|Galaxia AZS Częstochowa |- bgcolor=#e6f8ff | |align=left|Jastrzębie Borynia |- |4 |align=left|Czarni Radom |- |5 |align=left|Indykpol AZS Olsztyn |- |6 |align=left|Stolarka Wołomin |- |7 |align=left|KS Citroën Nysa |- |8 |align=left|Morze Bałtyk Szczecin |- bgcolor=#FFE7E7 |9 |align=left|GTPS Gorzów Wielkopolski |- bgcolor=#FFCCCC |10 |align=left|Polska Energia Sosnowiec |- |} {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center; margin:auto" !2001 Polish Champions |- |Mostostal-Azoty Kędzierzyn-Koźle 3rd title |} {| style="text-align: center; margin-top: 2em; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto" |- |Roland Dembończyk, Piotr Lipiński, Marcin Prus, Michał Chadała, Sławomir Gerymski (c), Dusan Kubica, Rafał Musielak, Przemysław Lach, Robert Szczerbaniuk, Wojciech Serafin, Sebastian Świderski, Paweł Papke |- |Head Coach |- |Andrzej Kubacki |} ==References== Category:Polish Championship of men's volleyball seasons
